channel.title: Musical Ambiences
channel.description:
I found musical ambiences in the game files.
I only figured the locations of these ambiences (BMS/sound/music)
Musical Ambience 1 - Unforeseen Consequences (jumping crates puzzle) Musical Ambience 2 - We've Got Hostiles (meeting the scientist at the end of the level) Musical Ambience 3 - Lambda Core (Lambda Complex Level A with the scientists) Musical Ambience 4 - Power Up (seeing the wounded guard) Musical Ambience 5 - Blast Pit (elevator ambience) Musical Ambience 6 - Blast Pit (upon calling the elevator that later fails falling to radioactive goo) Musical Ambience 8 - Questionable Ethics (unarmored agrunt room ambience)
I can't find where 7 plays Just want to share this in case you don't look at the files. Anyway anybody knows where 7 plays?

item.title: Musical Ambiences
item.dc:creator: Fear_Will_Find_You
item.description:
Hey there. Here’s a link to a thread where I show my complete track listing of the soundtrack, with these ambiences included. Thanks for posting their locations, it helped me out.

Cockroaches know everything! They are everywhere, sending intel to each other! What a humble nation!

item.title: Musical Ambiences

item.description:
Musical Ambience 7 - Blast Pit (upon going down the really long ladder that eventually leads you to falling into a pool of water while a bull-squid attacks you)

item.title: Musical Ambiences
item.dc:creator: ysrael214
item.description:
I found musical ambiences in the game files.

I only figured the locations of these ambiences (BMS/sound/music)

Musical Ambience 1 - Unforeseen Consequences (jumping crates puzzle)
Musical Ambience 2 - We’ve Got Hostiles (meeting the scientist at the end of the level)
Musical Ambience 3 - Lambda Core (Lambda Complex Level A with the scientists)
Musical Ambience 4 - Power Up (seeing the wounded guard)
Musical Ambience 5 - Blast Pit (elevator ambience)
Musical Ambience 6 - Blast Pit (upon calling the elevator that later fails falling to radioactive goo)
Musical Ambience 8 - Questionable Ethics (unarmored agrunt room ambience)

I can’t find where 7 plays
Just want to share this in case you don’t look at the files.
Anyway anybody knows where 7 plays?

Read full topic
